document.full_text: new york yankees evergreen closer mariano rivera became the first pitcher to make 1,000 career appearances with one team when the slender panamanian finished up wednesday's 7-3 win over the toronto blue jays.
document.title: evergreen closer rivera makes record 1,000th appearance
lines_and_colors: new york yankees evergreen closer mariano rivera became the first pitcher to make 1,000 career appearances with one team when the slender panamanian finished up wednesday's 7-3 win over the toronto blue jays.
